actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to deny the adjudication of certain political asylum claims made in the United States.
short_title: Political Asylum Application Reform Act of 1989

summary.text: Political Asylum Application Reform Act of 1989 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to make certain North, Central, or South Americans who fail to apply for U.S. asylum from a safe haven country ineligible to apply for asylum in the United States. Provides for proceedings expediting the exclusion and deportation of persons who violate such asylum provision. Defines "safe haven country" as one (other than that of the aliens nationality or last habitual residence) with which the United States has consular relations.

titles.title: Political Asylum Application Reform Act of 1989
A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to deny the adjudication of certain political asylum claims made in the United States.
